NAME tea
DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
I come here fishing every day thinking today will be the day! What are you trying to catch?

DLG SPR_1
No fish in here. Guess they shouldn't use tickets as bait.

DLG SPR_2
Route 44 doesn't go this way anymore.

DLG SPR_3
*arf* The fisher asked me to haunt this bus stop for them. Why? Don't ask me I'm just a dog!
